SEARCH
Package com.glamdring.greenZenith.userInteractions.products

Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.glamdring.greenZenith.userInteractions.products.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attributable, Interactable, Killable, Serializable
public class Product extends Object implements Killable, Attributable, Interactable, Serializable
Represents a product owned by a User, with it's respective attributes and parent plant for sale, allowing the creation, modification and deletion of it.
Since:
0.1
Version:
1.0.0
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product(int id, GZDBConnector gzdbc) throws InvalidProductException
      Retrieves information form the database utilizing only the ID and a connection to the database, and assigns the results to each correspondant field.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier that corresponds to a certain product registry on the database.
      gzdbc - A connection to the database.
      Throws:
      InvalidProductException - If the seller of this product does nor provide a connection or cannot be resolved, or if the plant being sold cannot be resolved or the ID cannot be resolved.

    • Product

      public Product(int id, Plant plantSale) throws InvalidProductException
      Retrieves information form the database utilizing only the ID and the plant that this product refers to from the database, and assigns the results to each correspondant field.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier that corresponds to a certain product registry on the database.
      plantSale - The plant that is being sold.
      Throws:
      InvalidProductException - If the seller of this product does not provide a connection or the ID cannot be resolved.

    • Product

      public Product(String title, String description, BigDecimal price, int quantity, Plant plantSale) throws InvalidProductException
      Creates a new Product object with the assigned parameters, which then is stored into the database.
      Parameters:
      title - The name identifier of this product at sale.
      description - The description of this product.
      price - The price users have to pay in order to buy this product.
      quantity - The amount of plants at sale.
      plantSale - The plant that is being sold.
      Throws:
      InvalidProductException - If the title or description exceed the allowed length, if the price is below or equal to zero, if the quantity is bigger than the plant's quantity.

      Each object posseses an ID or unique number identificator on the database to refer easily to it when doing SQL Queries and Actions. The ID of this plant.

    • setQuantity

      public void setQuantity(int quantity) throws InvalidProductException
      Sets the quantity of this plant that is for sale as a product.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The new quantity to be put for sale.
      Throws:
      InvalidProductException - If the quantity exceeds the amount of this type of plant that the seller has.
